verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-ADV: as far as he knew] [ARG1: the meeting with Kim Jong Un was still on track] .
President Donald Trump said as far as [ARG0: he] [V: knew] the meeting with Kim Jong Un was still on track .
President Donald Trump said as far as he knew [ARG1: the meeting with Kim Jong Un] [V: was] [ARGM-TMP: still] [ARG2: on track] .
